msg: Made HttpExecutionAware use generic Cancellable interface for ongoing operations

author: jukka
msg: Include Lucene/Tika as test dependencies in oak-jcr to allow running of test cases from an IDE

author: jukka
msg: Use a thread pool for executing background tasks.
This solves a problem with the Timer canceling itself if a listener was added and removed before any other listeners.

msg: Remove unused NodeCache and TripleCache; remove associated tests.
